text: He imanadaragana! Yakhana tomaderake bala haya, majalise sthana prasasta kare da'o takhana tomara sthana prasasta kare di'o, allah‌ tomadera jan'ya sthana prasasta kare debena [1]. Ara yakhana bala haya, “utha”, takhana tomara uthe yabe [2]. Tomadera madhye yara imana eneche ebam yaderake jnana dana kara hayeche allah‌ taderake maryadaya unnata karabena; ara tomara ya kara allah‌ se samparke sabisesa abahita
